subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Siempre Mio, a gelding owned in part by the Los Angeles Lakers’ Kobe Bryant and Pau Gasol, lost by a nose in the first race at Betfair Hollywood Park.
snippet: Siempre Mio, a gelding owned in part by the Los Angeles Lakers’ Kobe Bryant and Pau Gasol, lost by a nose in the first race at Betfair Hollywood Park.
